description:
The Bitcoin protocol launched on January 3, 2009, by an anonymous person, or group of people, using the alias Satoshi Nakamoto. Bitcoin is the world's first blockchain network, and its native currency — BTC — is the world's first cryptocurrency to gain widespread utility.
According to Satoshi Nakamoto, the purpose of Bitcoin is to provide "online payments to be sent directly from one party to another without going through a financial institution."
faq1Ans: Bitcoin is a form of digital currency that aims to eliminate the need for central authorities such as banks or governments. Instead, Bitcoin uses blockchain technology to support peer-to-peer transactions between users on a decentralized network.
